mapper.select: select ssa.id as ssaId, ssav.id as ssavId, ssa.sale_attr_id, ssa.sale_attr_name, ssav.id, ssav.sale_attr_value_name, ssav2.sku_id, if(ssav2.sku_id is not null, 1, 0) as isChecked from spu_sale_attr ssa inner join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.sale_attr_id = ssav.sale_attr_id and ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and ssa.spu_id = #{spuId} left join sku_sale_attr_value ssav2 on ssav2.sale_attr_id = ssa.sale_attr_id and ssav2.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id and ssav2.sku_id = #{skuId} order by ssavId

select sku_sale_attr_value.id as ssavId, sku_info.id,sku_sale_attr_value.sale_attr_value_id from sku_info,sku_sale_attr_value where sku_info.id = sku_sale_attr_value.sku_id and sku_info.spu_id = #{spuId};
